comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Professional ski rider from Blair, Wisconsin. His speciality was a somersault in the air, see The Virginia enterprise., March 06, 1914, Image 6., col. 6 "HENDRICKSON HAS NEW STUNT" In 1913 he was photographed somersaulting off a jump in Duluth - the earliest known photo of a ski stunt in America (according to Skiing Heritage Journal, March 1998)
